name: Surf Safari
description:
Surf Safari is an endless survival game built for playdate.

Use the crank to control your surfer by pivoting around the whirl pool, grab the life preserves to gain points but watch out for flotsam and the dreaded jelly fish! Either one will end your game!

Please note This has not yet been tested on the device as yet, any bugs and feedback are most welcome

Install Instructions

Download the .pdx.zip file and extract it in the Simulator's Disk folder or use one of the multiple ways to sideload the game onto your Playdate, detailed by Panic's official instructions here.
